title: It's like a warzone - Haitians surrounded by turf wars
description: An estimated 60% of the capital Port-au-Prince is now considered “lawless”, human rights groups say.

title: Kenya election 2022: Charts that explain the nation
description: The BBC tracks the crucial issues facing Kenyans as the country chooses a new president on 9 August.

title: The lockdown side-hustles that turned into full-time businesses
description: The pandemic turned some people into savvy entrepreneurs but how many have ditched their day job?

title: Anti-abortion Gen Z-ers see cause as social justice
description: Anti-abortion Gen Z activists think their fight isn't at odds with the beliefs of other young activists.

title: Cost of living: People turning back to cash as prices rise
description: Post Offices handled a record £801m in personal cash withdrawals in July.

title: Paralympic growth could be 'jeopardised' by any Olympic merger
description: The International Paralympic Committee says Paralympic growth could be "jeopardised" by any merger with the Olympics.

title: The woman who found a new life after being given six weeks to live
description: In 2015, Andrea Sheardown was diagnosed with a rare liver cancer and given just six weeks to live.

title: The newborns fighting for survival in Afghanistan
description: The BBC visits a ward where mothers are forced to share beds and have no access to pain relief.

title: Commonwealth Games: Delicious Orie wins gold for England
description: England's Delicious Orie wins Commonwealth Games men's super-heavyweight gold to end the boxing event with a victory which leaves the home crowd ecstatic.

title: Commonwealth Games: England denied dramatic relay gold by disqualification
description: England are denied a dramatic 4x400m relay gold after officials rule they committed a lane infringement before anchor Jessie Knight held off Canada in the tightest of finishes

title: Commonwealth Games: Australia beat India by nine runs to claim cricket gold
description: Australia continue their dominance of women's cricket with a nine-run win over India at Edgbaston to secure Commonwealth Games gold.

title: Commonwealth Games: Laura Muir captures 1500m title
description: Scotland's Laura Muir wins the Commonwealth 1500m crown with a ruthless run off the front of the pack.

title: Day-by-day guide & schedule
description: Your day-by-day guide to all the action at the 22nd Commonwealth Games in Birmingham.

title: Commonwealth Games: Australia's Cassiel Rousseau performs 'dive of the Commonwealth Games' for gold
description: Watch Australia's Cassiel Emmanuel Rousseau perform "the dive of the Games" during the men's 10m platform final to win the gold medal on day ten of the 2022 Commonwealth Games in Birmingham.

title: Commonwealth Games: England's women beat Australia to win historic first hockey gold
description: England women's hockey team win Commonwealth Games gold for the first time with a 2-1 victory over four-time champions Australia.

title: Horniman Museum to return 72 artefacts to Nigeria
description: The chair of the Horniman Museum said it was "moral" to return items taken by "force" years ago.

title: Free school meals: Councils in England cut back on holiday food-voucher help
description: Vouchers are being cut in value or scrapped altogether across England, BBC News research reveals.

title: Commonwealth Games: England men sweep to 4x100m relay title defence
description: Defending champions England roar to 4x100m men's relay gold as Ojie Edoburun anchors home a slick display.

title: Archie Battersbee: No parent must go through this again - family
description: The 12-year-old's family say they were "stripped of all our rights" in a legal battle with doctors.

title: Liz Truss will seek to bring in National Insurance cut immediately
description: The Tory leadership contender's team believe the move could happen within days if she became PM.

title: Girl dies after going missing at Windsor water park
description: Members of the public helped search a lake before the girl was found by emergency services.

title: Commonwealth Games 2022: Muzala Samukonga wins 400m gold as Matt Hudson-Smith takes silver
description: Watch Zambia teenager Muzala Samukonga produce an incredible surge in the final 100m to beat England's Matt Hudson Smith to 400m gold with a personal best time of 44.66 seconds.

title: Mexican mining rescue: Ten miners trapped underground
description: The 10 workers are stuck underground in Coahuila after a tunnel wall collapsed in a mine shaft.

title: Owami Davies: Fifth arrest over missing student nurse
description: A man is being held on suspicion of kidnap following the disappearance of Owami Davies.

title: Flash flooding swamps California's Death Valley
description: Nearly 1,000 staff and visitors were unable to leave as all roads in and out were closed.

title: Ukraine war: Four more grain ships leave Ukraine as hopes grow for export stability
description: Four vessels leave Ukrainian ports via a safe maritime corridor set up under a deal with Russia.

title: Macro photography: The hidden world of garden insects
description: Macro photographer Geraint Radford says insects have a bad reputation, but they're "funny".

title: Israel-Gaza: Death toll rises as Israel kills second top militant
description: Israel says it has killed a second senior leader of Palestinian Islamic Jihad in the Gaza Strip.

title: The Papers: Sunak pledges billions and winter poverty warning
description: The Tory leadership hopeful's promise of another cost of living package and calls for an emergency budget lead Sunday's papers.

title: France whale: Lost mammal stuck in River Seine to get vitamin boost
description: The visibly malnourished all-white beluga has been stuck 70km north of Paris since at least Tuesday.

title: Hamida Banu: Missing India woman found in Pakistan 'can't wait to go home'
description: Hamida Banu had been trafficked to Pakistan 20 years ago by an agent promising her a job in Dubai.
